titles.title: A bill to adjust the eastern boundary of the Deschutes Canyon-Steelhead Falls Wilderness Study Area in the State of Oregon, and for other purposes.
Crooked River Ranch Fire Protection Act
Crooked River Ranch Fire Protection Act
Crooked River Ranch Fire Protection Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Crooked River Ranch Fire Protection Act
This bill (1) modifies the boundary of the Deschutes Canyon-Steelhead Falls Wilderness Study Area in Oregon to exclude approximately 688 acres of public land, and (2) directs the Department of the Interior to manage such land to improve fire resiliency and forest health.
